title: Michelle O’Neill – 2022 Tribute to HM Queen Elizabeth II
author: admin
summary: The tribute made by Michelle O’Neill, the Northern Ireland First Minister Designate, on 8 September 2022.
content:
It is with deep regret that I have learned of the passing of Queen Elizabeth II today.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals

The British people will miss the leadership she gave throughout her 70 years as monarch.
